text: Harry Sven-Olof Bild (18 December 1936 â€“ 16 January 2025) was a Swedish professional footballer who played as a striker. He played for the Sweden men's national football team from 1957 to 1968, making 28 appearances. Bild died from cancer on 16 January 2025, at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Sweden Category:Swedish footballers
title: Harry Bild
